algorithm_technique: Iterative GCD calculation and finding the shortest subarray that can become 1.
problem_summary_simple: Find minimum operations to make all array elements 1 using GCD.
problem_summary_technical: If 1s exist, count operations. Otherwise, find the shortest subarray whose GCD is 1 and calculate operations based on its length.
key_insights: If the array already contains 1s, the problem reduces to converting other elements to 1.
The operation allows propagating a '1' through adjacent elements using GCD.
The minimum operations to make an element 1 is related to the shortest subarray that can produce a GCD of 1.
